actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Environmental Pollution. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 99-235.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Subcommittee on Environmental Pollution. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. With written report No. 99-538.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1097.

official_title: A bill to create the Florida Panther National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Florida Panther National Wildlife Refuge, Florida, with specified lands to be acquired by donation or purchase. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to create the Florida Panther National Wildlife Refuge in the State of Florida.
